com.cloudera.labs.envelope.plan

Interface RandomPlanner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Planner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitemporalHistoryPlanner, EventTimeHistoryPlanner, EventTimeUpsertPlanner

    public interface RandomPlanner
extends Planner
    Random planners generate individual mutations of a row at a time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getKeyFieldNames()
      Get the list of field names that constitute the natural key of the arriving records.
      List<Row> planMutationsForKey(Row key, List<Row> arrivingForKey, List<Row> existingForKey)
      Plan the random mutations for the arriving key of the step, using the arriving records and the existing records.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.labs.envelope.plan.Planner

        configure, getEmittedMutationTypes

    • Method Detail

      • planMutationsForKey

        List<Row> planMutationsForKey(Row key,
                              List<Row> arrivingForKey,
                              List<Row> existingForKey)
        Plan the random mutations for the arriving key of the step, using the arriving records and the existing records.
        Parameters:
        key - The row containing only the key fields and values.
        arrivingForKey - The arriving records of the key, from the DataFrame of the step.
        existingForKey - The existing records of the key, from the output of the step.
        Returns:
        The list of random mutations for the key to be applied to the output. The output will apply them in the same order as the list.

      • getKeyFieldNames

        List<String> getKeyFieldNames()
        Get the list of field names that constitute the natural key of the arriving records. This is used by Envelope to group arriving records by natural key, and to retrieve existing records from the output.
